# shipa Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)

or

- `host` (String)
- `admin_email` (String, Sensitive)
- `admin_password` (String, Sensitive)

or have `SHIPA_HOST` and `SHIPA_TOKEN` set as environment variables.
